sections.paragraph: 1. the mark of a stroke or blow; print
2. a figure formed by a blow or impression; a figure, image: of the images of the gods
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G5180; a die (as struck), that is, (by implication) a stamp or scar; by analogy a shape, that is, a statue, (figuratively) style or resemblance; specifically a sampler (“type”), that is, a model (for imitation) or instance (for warning): - en- (ex-) ample, fashion, figure, form, manner, pattern, print.
Cognate: G499, G5179, G5296
